pageContext.claim: “A recent Emerson College ePoll said that most Americans, especially Hispanics, feel that they are better off under President Trump than they were under President Obama.”
pageContext.analysis: The Emerson professor who helped lead the study told the Boston Globe Trump cherry-picked the data and exaggerated results. He noted that about 50 percent of total respondents said they disapprove of Trump’s job as president. And when asked whether they would rather have Trump or Obama as president, half chose Obama.
